repnme.cdata!: Ghana - Volta River Hydroelectric Expansion Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of the purchase and
            installation of the fifth and sixth generating units, which
            would bring the Akosombo power plant to its ultimate planned
            capacity of 882 MW, auxiliary equipment, and necessary
            consulting services.
